name: Solace (itch) (OnTheHouse Gaming)
description:
** This is a prototype and not a full game. This is a side project created while studying in school. All systems are in place and contains 1 Level and Boss Battle.

Solace is a third person ARPG set in the midst of a deadly world war. As a Spellblade, your communion with the Four Elementals allows you to control the powers of Fire, Water, Wind, and Lightning.

Use your power to push through the front line and take down the enemy forces. 

Features

  • Elemental Stances: Each stance has its own unique advantage in battle. Swap between stances to combine attacks and unleash your full potential.

  • Teleporting: With the power and speed of lightning, teleport to explore and in battle to escape deadly attacks in a pinch.

  • Ability Enhancement: Collect materials to upgrade your abilities to give them new effects and strengthen their power.

  • Enemy Formations: Groups of enemies will devise ways to combine their abilities to create a more complicated attack for the player to dodge.
